plugins.name: patent-writer
plugins.description: AI-powered Chinese patent application document writer using multi-agent orchestration. Orchestrates 8 specialized sub-agents to produce complete patent applications from technical disclosure documents.

plugins.name: paper-banana
plugins.description: Generate publication-quality academic illustrations (diagrams and statistical plots) for research papers using a multi-agent pipeline with Gemini models. Supports NeurIPS/ICML-style scientific diagrams, matplotlib statistical plots, and iterative quality refinement.
